definition: "Ms Perfect" (i.e. fair-skinned, rich and beautiful) (Internet slang)

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
"Mr Perfect" (i.e. tall, rich and handsome) (Internet slang)
children of entrepreneurs who became wealthy under Deng Xiaoping's economic reforms in the 1980s/see also 窮二代|穷二代[qiong2 er4 dai4]
"green tea bitch", a girl who seems innocent and charming but is actually calculating and manipulative
those who did not benefit from the Chinese economic reforms of the 1980s/see also 富二代[fu4 er4 dai4]
(Internet slang) guy who grew up in the countryside and gained a foothold in the city through hard work
to live off a rich man
